text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Tozeur | native_name = توزر | native_name_lang = aeb | other_name = | type = Governorate | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | image_map = Tozeur in Tunisia.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of Tunisia with Tozeur highlighted | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Tunisia | established_title = Created | established_date = June 21, 1956 | seat_type = Capital | seat = Tozeur | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 4719 | area_rank = Ranked 11th of 24 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 107912 | population_as_of = 2014 | population_rank = Ranked 24th of 24 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01 | postal_code_type = Postal prefix | postal_code = xx | area_code_type = Calling code | area_code = | iso_code = TN-72 | website = | footnotes = }} Tozeur Governorate ( ) is the westernmost of the 24 governorates of Tunisia and is on the border with Algeria. It covers an area of 4,719 km². As of the 2014 census, 107,912 people lived there Census 2014 (National Institute of Statistics) that makes it the smallest governorate of the country by population. The capital is Tozeur. == References == Category:1956 establishments in Tunisia Category:Governorates of Tunisia
title: Tozeur Governorate
